definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The article provides evidence support for Contingency Theory on Employee Turnover.
sentences.chinese: 爲員工離職權變主義學說提供了證據支持。

sentences.english: In general, Su Qin's unite means is called a variable means.
sentences.chinese: 一般地說，蘇秦“合縱術”被世人冠之以權變之術。

sentences.english: Most solutions came from workarounds found by third parties.
sentences.chinese: 大部分來自權變措施的方案都是由第三方發現的。

sentences.english: Why have our priorities become so mangled?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼優先權變的如此混亂？

sentences.english: Every contingency must work in all browsers.
sentences.chinese: 每一種權變都應當在所有的瀏覽器中起作用。

sentences.english: The best contingency design prevents errors from occurring.
sentences.chinese: 最好的權變設計可防止錯誤的產生。

sentences.english: Fiedler Contingency Theory's predictive function to leadership effectiveness needs to be further studied.
sentences.chinese: 菲德勒權變理論對領導效能的預測功能需進一步探討。

sentences.english: Great contingency design never gets in the way.
sentences.chinese: 好的權變設計永遠不會礙事。

sentences.english: Chapter six is"the conservativeness and change of the civil procedural judicial system in the Early Republican".
sentences.chinese: 第六章“民初民事訴訟審判制度的泥守與權變”。

sentences.english: Preserving the structure of the state, gathering the valiant and courageous are what the Middle Strategy is.
sentences.chinese: 保全國家，收羅英雄，就是《中略》所論的權變。

definition: principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
(idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation

lit. secretly crossing the Wei River 渭河[Wei4 He2] at Chencang (idiom, refers to a stratagem used by Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] in 206 BC against Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3] of Chu)/fig. to feign one thing while doing another/to cheat under cover of a diversion
to solve or overcome (a difficult problem)/to beat (a video game)
to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
(coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
